category.name: Active Workspace Search
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: AWC_search_filter_wildcard
preference.preference_description: Specifies how wild card will be applied for facet filter. Valid values are: * 0 : No wild card will be applied to search string. * 1 : Trailing wild card will be applied to search string. * 2 : Leading wild card will be applied to search string. * 3 : Both leading and trailing wild cards will be applied to search string. This is the default value. If the preference is either not set or has a value other than in the list above, the following preference will be used instead: AWC_search_automatic_wildcard.
